pr_title: Add documentation to describe listing and deleting APIs/API Products/Applications and generating keys for APIs/API Products using the API Controller

timeline.message: Restructure documentation on listing APIs/API Products/Applications using apictl
Modify documentation to add get-keys support for API Products
Add documentation on deleting APIs/API Products/Applications using apictl

timeline.author: hisanhunais
timeline.diffHunk:
@@ -277,13 +277,15 @@ Run any of the following CTL commands to get keys for the API.
             
         -   Required :  
             `--environment` or `-e` : Key generation environment  
-            `--name` or `-n` : API to enerate keys for  
-            `--version` or `-v` : Version of the API  
-            `--provider` or `-r` : Provider of the API   
+            `--name` or `-n` : API or API Product to enerate keys for
